jobs_results.title: [Part-Time] Junior Developer - Android & API Support
jobs_results.description:
üöÄ Who we are

Aptoide is the leading original distribution platform for Android and IOS, empowering both Users, Developers, OEMs and Telecoms in the mobile ecosystem for the last 15 years. We became the fastest growing original App Store and distribution platform in the world, with over 50 Million monthly active users (MAU), 1 million apps across our ecosystem and 10 Distribution Partners.

Aptoide's mission is to bring back the freedom of choice within the apps world, shaping the future of app economy by creating unmatched value for developers and users globally. The way you play? the way you get your apps? We‚Äôre making everything easier and better for everyone!

We are also aware that our success depends on our Aptoiders achievements! That‚Äôs why we are proud to be a tech company who enjoys to set people as a core priority. Our Aptoiders' Talents and Skills are the algorithm for our whole success. And this is where you can come in!

Our Superpowers
‚Ä¢ Innovation - meaning, we build our own way to the future.
‚Ä¢ Ambition - we always go beyond.
‚Ä¢ Integrity - we are transparent and trustworthy.
‚Ä¢ Results-driven - we are strong on delivering.
‚Ä¢ Collaboration - the superpower is ‚ÄòWe‚Äô, not ‚ÄòI‚Äô.

These are our values! These are Aptoide‚Äôs superpowers! This IS Aptoide!

üß© Who You Are

We are looking for a proactive and motivated developer to join a highly successful project with significant impact in the gaming industry.

If you are eager to learn, enjoy solving technical problems effectively, love contributing to innovative products and solutions, and thrive in the collaboration and creativity of a high-performing, international team ‚Äì we‚Äôd love to hear from you!

üéØ What are you going to do?
‚Ä¢ Write, maintain code, and fix minor bugs;
‚Ä¢ Assist in developing and maintaining Android applications and operational Python APIs that process and deliver information to the company in near-real-time;
‚Ä¢ Provide technical support to partners and developers to ensure seamless integration of our tools and achieve successful outcomes.

‚≠ê What are we looking for?
‚Ä¢ Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field.
‚Ä¢ Basic knowledge of Java or Kotlin (Android development focus) and Python and API concepts.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of version control systems (e.g. Git).
‚Ä¢ Ability to troubleshoot and solve problems effectively within a team.
‚Ä¢ A proactive attitude and eagerness to learn and grow.
‚Ä¢ Good communication and collaboration skills.

üíé What will you get?
‚Ä¢ Opportunity to join an innovative company impacting millions globally.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with an international, diverse, and highly skilled team.
‚Ä¢ Enjoy a hybrid working environment [4 days remote per week].
‚Ä¢ Empowering and trustful environment with flexible working time.
‚Ä¢ Focus in your Career Growth, with Learning and Development opportunities.
‚Ä¢ Supportive and inclusive culture with regular engagement and team building activities.
‚Ä¢ Competitive Compensation Package.
‚Ä¢ Great Health & Well-Being Benefits.
‚Ä¢ Cosy office space with free snacks and breakfast available everyday.
‚Ä¢ Incredible Annual Retreat.

jobs_results.title: Mobile Android Developer
jobs_results.description:
Forvia, a sustainable mobility technology leader

We pioneer technology for mobility experience that matter to people.

About Forvia Software Services:

Forvia Software Services is a dynamic and innovative company within the Forvia Group, specializing in delivering cutting-edge software solutions for the automotive industry. We collaborate closely with leading OEMs to provide innovative applications that shape the future of in-car technology. Join us and be a part of the exciting journey to redefine the automotive software landscape.

Your mission, roles and responsibilities

Position Overview:

We are seeking a skilled Android Developer to join our team. As a software Developer at Forvia Software Services, you will be responsible for creating applications that interact with the car's systems at the infotainment level. You will need expertise in Android development, experience with Bluetooth and Wi-Fi connectivity, and knowledge of cross-platform development. Additionally, familiarity with Car Operating Systems and APIs provided by car manufacturers & third party App developers.

Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢ Create embedded car Applications for the infotainment that interact with the car's systems.
‚Ä¢ Develop apps that seamlessly connect with car hardware and software.
‚Ä¢ Write efficient and reusable code for a variety of platforms.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with the development team to ensure apps function seamlessly.
‚Ä¢ Stay updated on advancements in mobile development and automotive technologies.
‚Ä¢ Continuously improve embedded car App performance and user experience.
‚Ä¢ Adhere to industry standards and best practices in App development.

Your profile and competencies to succeed

Key Skills:
‚Ä¢ Android development, with experience in Bluetooth and Wi-Fi connectivity.
‚Ä¢ Ability to write robust, efficient, and reusable code that functions seamlessly across different systems.
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with Car Operating Systems (, e.g., Automotive Android, Automotive Grade Linux).
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of APIs provided by car manufacturers or third party App providers or standard automotive middleware APIs, which enables embedded apps to communicate with car hardware and software.

Programming Languages :
‚Ä¢ Expertise in Java, Swift, JavaScript/TypeScript, Python/C#, C++

Operating Systems :
‚Ä¢ Android, (Linux, iOS is a plus)

Development Tools & Frameworks:
‚Ä¢ Visual Studio/Eclipse/IntelliJ, Android Studio, Unity
‚Ä¢ Docker and Kubernetes

Other Skills and Technologies :
‚Ä¢ Automotive Grade Linux (AGL)
‚Ä¢ Machine Learning Frameworks such as TensorFlow or PyTorch
‚Ä¢ UI/UX Design Principles: Specific to automotive infotainment systems to ensure user-friendly and safe interactions.
‚Ä¢ Cybersecurity Basics: Understanding the principles of secure coding and data protection
‚Ä¢ 5G Technology: Knowledge of 5G and its application in automotive contexts for connected services.

Qualifications:
‚Ä¢ Degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
‚Ä¢ Proven experience as an App Developer with a focus on Android development.
‚Ä¢ Experience with Bluetooth and Wi-Fi connectivity.
‚Ä¢ Strong coding skills and the ability to write efficient, reusable code.
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with Car Operating Systems (e.g., Automotive Grade Linux, Automotive Android).
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of APIs provided by car manufacturers or standard automotive middleware APIs and Third party App providers
‚Ä¢ Strong problem-solving and critical-thinking skills.
‚Ä¢ Excellent communication and collaboration abilities.

Language Requirements:
‚Ä¢ Proficiency in English is mandatory.
‚Ä¢ Proficiency in French and German is a plus.

What we can do for you
‚Ä¢ At Forvia, you will find an engaging and dynamic environment where you can contribute to the development of sustainable mobility leading technologies.
‚Ä¢ We are the seventh-largest global automotive supplier, employing more than 157,000 people in more than 40 countries which makes a lot of opportunity for career development.
‚Ä¢ We welcome energetic and agile people who can thrive in a fast-changing environment. People who share our strong values. Team players with a collaborative mindset and a passion to deliver high standards for our clients. Lifelong learners. High performers. Globally minded people who aspire to work in a transforming industry, where excellence, speed, and quality count.
‚Ä¢ We cultivate a learning environment, dedicating tools and resources to ensure we remain at the forefront of mobility. Our people enjoy an average of more than 22 hours of online and in-person training within FORVIA University (five campuses around the world)
‚Ä¢ We offer a multicultural environment that values diversity and international collaboration. We believe that diversity is a strength. To create an inclusive culture where all forms of diversity create real value for the company, we have adopted gender diversity targets and inclusion action plans.
‚Ä¢ Achieving CO2 Net Zero as a pioneer of the automotive industry is a priority: In June 2022, Forvia became the first global automotive group to be certified with the new SBTI Net-Zero Standard (the most ambitious standard of SBTi), aligned with the ambition of the 2015 Paris Agreement of limiting global warming to 1.5¬∞C. Three principles guide our action: use less, use better and use longer, with a focus on recyclability and circular economy.

Why join us

FORVIA is an automotive technology group at the heart of smarter and more sustainable mobility. We bring together expertise in electronics, clean mobility, lighting, interiors, seating, and lifecycle solutions to drive change in the automotive industry.

With a history stretching back more than a century, we are the 7th largest global automotive supplier, employing more than 157,000 people in 43 countries. You'll find our technology in around 1 out of 2 vehicles produced anywhere in the world.

In June 2022, we became the 1st global automotive group to be certified with the SBTI Net-Zero Standard. We have committed to reach CO2 Net Zero by no later than 2045.

As technological innovation and the need for sustainability transform the automotive industry, we are ideally positioned to deliver solutions that will enhance the lives of road-users everywhere.

jobs_results.title: Android Developer
jobs_results.description:
Company Description

Who is DBServices

We are positioned to help organizations in their digital transformation process by promoting innovation and optimizing legacy systems with our Digital Services. We are a spinoff of DBServer in Portugal, one of the largest and best software development companies in Brazil with more than 28 years of experience and 500+ projects successfully delivered.

What we DO

Digital Business Services. Advisory & Transformation Consulting in Cloud Migration, DevOps, QAOps, FinOps. Specialized in Test Automation, Tools and Test Frameworks (ATM, SAP), TDD, Unit Testing, Performance & Security Testing and Inspection.

DBLab is focused on MVPs, Prototyping and Proofs of Concept. Innovation is in our blood. Let us help you to focus on your Business while we Design+Build breakthrough and leading-edge solutions.

Agile Projects Custom Software Development. Software that meets the unique processes of your business, solves your specific problems, satisfies your exclusive needs and makes your workflows easier, faster, and more efficient.

Team Extension increases the capacity of your teams with the excellence level you would expect when hiring local resources. Our teams can work seamlessly as part of your teams or work as autonomous squads.

Job Description

Android Developer | DBServices

Qualifications
‚Ä¢ Android Studio
‚Ä¢ Kotlin e/ou Java
‚Ä¢ MVP, MVVM ou MVI
‚Ä¢ Jetpack Components
‚Ä¢ Sistemas de controlo de vers√µes (Git)

Differential:
‚Ä¢ Hilt / Dagger 2
‚Ä¢ Room
‚Ä¢ JUnit / Mockito / Espresso
‚Ä¢ Jetpack Compose
‚Ä¢ Motion Layout
‚Ä¢ Ferramentas CI/CD

Additional Information
‚Ä¢ Advanced English.

jobs_results.title: Android Developer
jobs_results.description:
eyenov is looking for a passionate Android developer to integrate our team and to work in a multi-platform mobile video edit software.

You will be working alongside other engineers and developers working on different layers and different versions of the application. Therefore, a commitment to collaborative problem solving, sophisticated design, and the creation of quality products is essential.

Skills:
‚Ä¢ Strong knowledge of Android SDK, different versions of Android
‚Ä¢ Strong knowledge of Android UI design principles, patterns and best practices
‚Ä¢ Interest in building multimedia applications for video editing
‚Ä¢ Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with continuous integration
‚Ä¢ Strong debugging skills
‚Ä¢ A knack for benchmarking and optimization
‚Ä¢ A born collaborator, you value communication and sharing knowledge. You also work well in a team setting and like to achieve common goals & objectives
‚Ä¢ Proficient in spoken and written English

Some of our perks and benefits include:
‚Ä¢ Private retirement plan
‚Ä¢ Health insurance
‚Ä¢ Productivity bonuses
‚Ä¢ Flexible work schedule
‚Ä¢ Possibility to work fully remote, hybrid or in our office located in the Greater Lisbon area.

About eyenov:
We are a company specialized in the fields of multimedia, computer graphics, augmented reality, virtual reality, computer vision, machine learning, mobile, desktop and server applications, as well as several other emerging state-of-the-art technologies. One of the strongest points of our team is the ability to adapt to new technological challenges, even if it requires large R&D background work or to come up with novel concepts, algorithms or paradigms.

If you‚Äôre looking for a new challenge, something different and to work with top notch senior software developers on highly addictive projects, get on board!

jobs_results.title: Senior Android Developer in Portugal
jobs_results.description:
DESCRIPTION

We are looking for experienced software developers, creators of software that will change the automotive world. Ambitious profiles who are motivated do develop high-end applications for vehicle infotainment systems are more than welcome to apply to be part of the upcoming generations of graphical Human-Machine-Interfaces.

RESPONSIBILITIES

> write high-performing and maintain codes in Kotlin/Java
> develop new Android applications using cutting-edge technology (MVVM, Flow, Compose)
> understand, manage and perform vital code testing
> contribute to the environment by delivering solutions to leading car manufacturers

REQUIREMENTS

Must have:
> University degree in Computer Science or in one comparable study or professional experience
> 5+ years of professional experience with Android (Kotlin/Java) using MVVM, Coroutines and Jetpack
> Experience with GIT, Automated Testing (Espresso) and Gradle
> Proficient in English, spoken and written

Nice to have:
> Knowledge of C++ or any other computer language
> Experience with AWS services
> German language skills

BENEFITS

> Competitive compensation, extraordinary pension plan, profit sharing and various benefits in the areas of sport/health, work/life, mobility and fun
> Freedom to try out and use new technologies
> An extraordinarily good work environment with many nations who grow and work hand in hand to meet those challenges
> Transparency and room for new initiatives and ideas
> On kununu.de you can get an idea about our working culture! (https://www.kununu.com/de/pixida3)

Pixida is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer! We are committed to a work environment that supports, inspires and respects all individuals and in which all aspects of employment are applied without discrimination. Therefore we encourage all individuals to apply!

In order to be able to get a comprehensive overview of your application, we ask you to make sure to include certificates, employer's references, etc. with your resume. In addition, we ask you to provide information about your possible start date, salary expectations and language skills.

jobs_results.title: Senior Android Developer - Kotlin
jobs_results.description:
We are looking for an Android developer responsible for the development and maintenance of

applications aimed at a vast number of diverse Android devices. Your primary focus will be the

development of Android applications and their integration with back-end services. You will be

working along-side other engineers and developers working on different layers of the

infrastructure. Therefore, commitment to collaborative problem solving, sophisticated design,

and creating quality products is essential.

Responsibilities

‚óè Writing clean and efficient code for Android applications

‚óè Monitoring the performance of live apps and work on optimizing them at the code level

‚óè Identifying and resolving bottlenecks, rectifying bugs and enhancing application

performance

‚óè Performing unit and instrumentation tests on code

‚óè Collaborating with cross-functional teams to define and design new features

‚óè Staying up to date with new mobile technology trends, applications, and protocols

You have prior experience as an Android Developer using Kotlin, Java, Android SDK and

reactive programming

‚óè Knowledge of SOLID principles

‚óè You have experience in publishing an application on the Google Play store

‚óè Proven work experience in design patterns mobile architecture using frameworks such

as MVVM/MVC/MVP

‚óè Familiarity with firebase integrations

‚óè Familiarity with RESTful APIs to effectively integrate Android applications

‚óè Understanding of Google‚Äôs Android design principles and interface guidelines

‚óè Proficient understanding of code versioning tools such as Git

‚óè Familiarity with continuous integration (Bitrise, Fastlane, etc)

‚óè Familiarity with various testing tools

‚óè You are a problem solver with good analytical skills
